remarks: The final constructed Hilbert space is a vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhillvec.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhillvec.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhillvec.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhillvec $p |- ( ph -> U e. LVec ) $.
